00080 union cli_field_alignment {
00081     struct { char n; cli_oid_t v;  }  _cli_oid_t;
00082     struct { char n; cli_bool_t v;  } _cli_bool_t;
00083     struct { char n; cli_int1_t v;  } _cli_int1_t;
00084     struct { char n; cli_int2_t v;  } _cli_int2_t;
00085     struct { char n; cli_int4_t v;  } _cli_int4_t;
00086     struct { char n; cli_int8_t v;  } _cli_int8_t;
00087     struct { char n; cli_real4_t v; } _cli_real4_t;
00088     struct { char n; cli_real8_t v; } _cli_real8_t;
00089     struct { char n; cli_array_t v; } _cli_array_t;
00090     struct { char n; char*       v; } _cli_asciiz_t;
00091     struct { char n; wchar_t     v; } _cli_wstring_t;
00092     struct { char n; cli_rectangle_t v; } _cli_rectangle_t;
00093 };
00094 
00095 #define CLI_ALIGNMENT(type) \
00096         (((char *)&(((union cli_field_alignment*)0)->_##type.v)) - ((char *)&(((union cli_field_alignment*)0)->_##type.n)))

00160 #if defined(__FreeBSD__)
00161 END_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00162 #include <sys/param.h>
00163 #include <netinet/in.h>
00164 BEGIN_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00165 #define USE_HTON_NTOH
00166 #elif defined(__linux__)
00167 //
00168 // At Linux inline assembly declarations of ntohl, htonl... are available
00169 //
00170 END_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00171 #include <netinet/in.h>
00172 BEGIN_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00173 #define USE_HTON_NTOH
00174 #else
00175 #if defined(_WIN32) && _M_IX86 >= 400
00176 #pragma warning(disable:4035) // disable "no return" warning
00177 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00178 static
00179 #else
00180 inline 
00181 #endif
00182 int swap_bytes_in_dword(int val) {
00183     __asm {
00184           mov eax, val
00185           bswap eax
00186     }
00187 }
00188 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00189 static
00190 #else
00191 inline 
00192 #endif
00193 short swap_bytes_in_word(short val) {
00194     __asm {
00195           mov ax, val
00196           xchg al,ah
00197     }
00198 }
00199 #pragma warning(default:4035)
00200 #define ntohl(w) swap_bytes_in_dword(w)
00201 #define htonl(w) swap_bytes_in_dword(w)
00202 #define ntohs(w) swap_bytes_in_word(w)
00203 #define htons(w) swap_bytes_in_word(w)
00204 
00205 #define USE_HTON_NTOH
00206 #endif
00207 #endif

00212 inline char* pack2(char* dst, int2 val) { 
00213     *dst++ = char(val >> 8);
00214     *dst++ = char(val);     
00215     return dst;
00216 }
00217 
00218 inline char* pack2(char* dst, char* src) { 
00219     return pack2(dst, *(int2*)src); 
00220 }
00221 
00222 inline void pack2(int2& val) { 
00223 #if BYTE_ORDER != BIG_ENDIAN
00224 #ifdef USE_HTON_NTOH
00225     val = htons(val);
00226 #else
00227     pack2((char*)&val, val); 
00228 #endif
00229 #endif
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00233 inline char* pack4(char* dst, int4 val) { 
00234     *dst++ = char(val >> 24);
00235     *dst++ = char(val >> 16);     
00236     *dst++ = char(val >> 8); 
00237     *dst++ = char(val);
00238     return dst;
00239 }
00240 
00241 inline char* pack4(char* dst, char* src) { 
00242     return pack4(dst, *(int4*)src); 
00243 }
00244 
00245 inline void pack4(int4& val) { 
00246 #if BYTE_ORDER != BIG_ENDIAN
00247 #ifdef USE_HTON_NTOH
00248     val = htonl(val);
00249 #else
00250     pack4((char*)&val, val); 
00251 #endif
00252 #endif
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 inline char* pack8(char* dst, char* src) { 
00257 #if BYTE_ORDER == BIG_ENDIAN
00258     return pack4( pack4(dst, src), src + 4);
00259 #else
00260     return pack4( pack4(dst, src + 4), src);
00261 #endif
00262 }
00263 
00264 inline char* pack8(char* dst, db_int8 val) { 
00265     return pack8(dst, (char*)&val);
00266 }
00267 
00268 inline char* pack_oid(char* dst, cli_oid_t oid)
00269 {
00270     return (sizeof(oid) == 4) ? pack4(dst, (int4)oid) : pack8(dst, (char*)&oid);
00271 }
00272 
00273 inline char* pack_rectangle(char* dst, cli_rectangle_t* rect)
00274 {
00275     if (sizeof(cli_coord_t) == 4) { 
00276         for (int i = 0; i < RECTANGLE_DIMENSION*2; i++) { 
00277             dst = pack4(dst, (char*)&rect->boundary[i]);
00278         }
00279     } else { 
00280         for (int i = 0; i < RECTANGLE_DIMENSION*2; i++) { 
00281             dst = pack8(dst, (char*)&rect->boundary[i]);
00282         }
00283     }
00284     return dst;
00285 }
00286 
00287 inline int2 unpack2(char* src) { 
00288     nat1* s = (nat1*)src;
00289     return (s[0] << 8) + s[1]; 
00290 }
00291 
00292 inline char* unpack2(char* dst, char* src) { 
00293     *(int2*)dst = unpack2(src);
00294     return src + 2;
00295 }
00296 
00297 inline void  unpack2(int2& val) { 
00298 #if BYTE_ORDER != BIG_ENDIAN
00299 #ifdef USE_HTON_NTOH
00300     val = ntohs(val);
00301 #else
00302     val = unpack2((char*)&val); 
00303 #endif
00304 #endif
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 inline int4  unpack4(char* src) { 
00309     nat1* s = (nat1*)src;
00310     return (((((s[0] << 8) + s[1]) << 8) + s[2]) << 8) + s[3];
00311 } 
00312 
00313 inline char* unpack4(char* dst, char* src) { 
00314     *(int4*)dst = unpack4(src);
00315     return src + 4;
00316 }
00317 
00318 inline void unpack4(int4& val) { 
00319 #if BYTE_ORDER != BIG_ENDIAN
00320 #ifdef USE_HTON_NTOH
00321     val = ntohl(val);
00322 #else
00323     val = unpack4((char*)&val); 
00324 #endif
00325 #endif
00326 }
00327 
00328 inline char* unpack8(char* dst, char* src) { 
00329 #if BYTE_ORDER == BIG_ENDIAN
00330     *(int4*)dst = unpack4(src);
00331     *((int4*)dst+1) = unpack4(src+4);
00332 #else
00333     *(int4*)dst = unpack4(src+4);
00334     *((int4*)dst+1) = unpack4(src);
00335 #endif
00336     return src + 8;
00337 }
00338 
00339 inline db_int8 unpack8(char* src) { 
00340     db_int8 val;
00341     unpack8((char*)&val, src);
00342     return val;
00343 }
00344 
00345 inline cli_oid_t unpack_oid(char* src)
00346 {
00347     cli_oid_t oid;
00348     if (sizeof(oid) == 4) {
00349         oid = unpack4(src);
00350     } else { 
00351         unpack8((char*)&oid, src);
00352     }
00353     return oid;
00354 }
00355 
00356 inline char* unpack_rectangle(cli_rectangle_t* rect, char* src)
00357 {
00358     if (sizeof(cli_coord_t) == 4) { 
00359         for (int i = 0; i < RECTANGLE_DIMENSION*2; i++) { 
00360             src = unpack4((char*)&rect->boundary[i], src);
00361         }
00362     } else { 
00363         for (int i = 0; i < RECTANGLE_DIMENSION*2; i++) { 
00364             src = unpack8((char*)&rect->boundary[i], src);
00365         }
00366     }
00367     return src;
00368 }
00369 
00370 struct cli_request { 
00371     int4 length;
00372     int4 cmd;
00373     int4 stmt_id;
00374     
00375     void pack() { 
00376         pack4(length);
00377         pack4(cmd);
00378         pack4(stmt_id);
00379     }
00380 
00381     void unpack() { 
00382         unpack4(length);
00383         unpack4(cmd);
00384         unpack4(stmt_id);
00385     }
00386 };
